source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_00<tab>Wedge is standing by to see you off.
target: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_00<tab>ヤーンの大穴のウェッジは、仲間たちを見送っているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_01<tab>Wedge informs you that Cid and Alpha have already descended into the Yawn, and encourages you to follow them as soon as you are ready.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_01<tab>ウェッジに見送られた。次元の狭間に戻り、「ネロ」と話そう。
次元の狭間へは、ヤーンの大穴にいる「ガーロンド社の調査員」が案内してくれるようだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive at base camp to find Nero sickly and irritable. Cid duly takes it upon himself to brief you on your third opponent, theorizing that the next battle should be far less complicated than the last. As always, Alpha waits patiently for your signal to proceed.

※In the event that you leave the Interdimensional Rift, you may re-enter by speaking with the Ironworks hand at the Yawn.
target: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_02<tab>具合の悪そうなネロと話した。次元の狭間の「アルファ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_03<tab>Alpha stands ready to enter the Sigmascape with you. Gather your gear and your courage, and smash through the defenses of the Guardian!

※Sigmascape V3.0 can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_03<tab>アルファと話した。しっかりと準備を整えて、被検世界シグマに乗りこみ、待ち受けるガーディアンを撃破しよう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_04<tab>The Guardian lies defeated. Return to the Interdimensional Rift and speak with Cid.
target: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_04<tab>シグマIII、ガーディアンを撃破した。次元の狭間の「シド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_05<tab>After complimenting you on your talent for avoiding giant lasers, Cid expresses regret that you could not have encountered the wonders recreated in the Sigmascape under happier circumstances. But as the final battle of this test world looms ever closer, there seems little point in entertaining such thoughts...
target: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SEQ_05<tab>シドと話した。彼は被検世界シグマのもととなった世界に、想いを馳せているようだ。次は、今回最後の戦いになるはずだが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nero in the Interdimensional Rift.

target: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_TODO_02<tab>「次元の狭間オメガ：シグマ編3」を攻略

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_BIGGS_000_000<tab>We appreciate you coming up to meet us. After imagining everything that could go wrong in there, it was a relief to find you quietly getting on with the job. We'll have to hurry up and get well!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_BIGGS_000_000<tab>上がってきてくれて、ありがとうな。
お前たちの無事な姿に、元気をもらったよ。
怪我だって、ササッと治せるさ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_005<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I believe Biggs and Wedge are waiting on you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_005<tab>おつかれさまです！
あちらで、ビッグスさんとウェッジさんが、
お待ちのようですよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_WEDGE_000_010<tab>Alpha and the chief have already gone back in, so don't let us keep you. Our colleague over there should be glad to help you make the descent as soon as you're ready.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_WEDGE_000_010<tab>親方とアルファは、ちゃんと穴に下りられたみたいッス。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>も、うちの調査員に声をかければ、
安全に下ろしてもらえるッス！

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_WEDGE_000_011<tab>This dreadful experiment may have a way to go yet, but if you keep taking it one battle at a time, you'll be fighting Omega before you─ I-I mean, it will all be over before you know it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_WEDGE_000_011<tab>オメガの検証は、まだ続くらしいけど……
みんななら絶対に負けないって、信じてるッス！
気をつけて、いってらっしゃいッス！

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_WEDGE_000_020<tab>Say the word to our colleague over there, and he'll help you make the descent into the Yawn.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_WEDGE_000_020<tab>そこにいる「ガーロンド社の調査員」に声をかけるッス。
穴の中に、安全に下ろしてもらえるはずッス！

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_025<tab>Can I lower you into the rift, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? I may not be much use in battle, but I can at least do you this small service.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_025<tab>あっ、あなたも「次元の狭間」へお戻りになりますか？
これくらいしかお手伝いできませんが……
せめて穴に下りるサポートくらいは、させてください！
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>「次元の狭間」に移動しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_030<tab>Thank you for joining me up there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I know it meant a lot to Biggs and Wedge.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_030<tab>上までつきあってくれて、ありがとう。
ビッグスとウェッジも、励まされたことだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_040<tab>Ah. Back, are you? We should... <gulp> We should return to the task at hand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_040<tab>ああ……お前か……。
戻ったなら……とっとと検証を再開すンぞ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_041<tab>Everything all right, Nero? You look a bit green around the gills.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_041<tab>ネロ……？
どうした、具合が悪そうじゃないか。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_042<tab>The kettle was full of saltwater...
Not the best stuff to brew coffee with, it turns out...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_042<tab>ケトルの中身が、それはそれは濃い塩水だったもンでね……。
うっかりコーヒーを淹れて、酷い目にあった。
おかげで気分が悪い……。

TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_043<tab>……塩水？
俺は入れた覚えがないが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_044<tab>Of course not. That would involve you filling it. <heave> The water came from Alpha...created by one of those cards of his.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_044<tab>当然だ……お前にそンな面白要素を期待しちゃいない……。
水を補充したのはアルファだ……。
それも、あの不思議カードを使ってな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_045<tab>It was very thoughtful of him to make the effort...but next time...I'd prefer a beverage that didn't leave me feeling ill...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_045<tab>チョコボに味が理解できるかは不明だが、
次回は……まあ……ウマい水を湧かせてもらいたいもンだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_046<tab>...In any case, you can handle support for this third battle on your own. I want to begin preparations for the fourth.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_046<tab>……そンなことより。
次の戦闘のサポートは、ガーロンド……お前がやれ……。
オレはその隙に……四層の準備をしたいンでね……。

TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_047<tab>あ、ああ……。
それは構わない、任されよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_048<tab>Right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─your next foe is known simply as the “Guardian.” Unlike that ordeal with Chadarnook, this battle promises to be relatively straightforward. Courage and steel should be enough to win you the day.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_048<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、次の敵は「ガーディアン」。
チャダルヌーク戦と違って、真っ向勝負になりそうだ。
装備と心、両方を整えたら、アルファと突入してくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_050<tab>The file I found on the Guardian says it was a weapon employed in the defense of an empire's capital city. That should give you some idea of the extent of its capabilities.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_050<tab>「ガーディアン」のデータには、
首都防衛用の兵器とあるが……。
準備が整ったら、アルファと突入してくれ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_055<tab>Just...leave me be...
I'm having enough trouble concentrating as it is...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_055<tab>しばらく……放っておいてくれ……。
四層のための仕込みを、しなきゃならないもンでね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_060<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Will you be descending into the Yawn?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_060<tab>「次元の狭間」での戦い、おつかれさまです！
大穴の中に降りますか？
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>「次元の狭間」に移動しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>Alpha seems concerned about Nero, but otherwise eager to proceed. You may enter Sigmascape V3.0 whenever you are ready.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>アルファは、ネロを案じている様子だが、
戦いに赴く意思はあるようだ。
被検世界「シグマ」第三層へ、ともに突入しよう。

TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_ALPHA_000_080<tab>クエッ……？
クエッ、クエーッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_090<tab>Done, are you? Then it's almost time...
target: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_NERO_000_090<tab>勝ったか……じゃ、いよいよ次だな…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_100<tab>Congratulations, old friend. Judging by the lack of smoking holes, I'd say you have a natural talent for avoiding laser beams. And this is what passes for a straightforward battle in here...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_100<tab>怪我は平気か……？
ガーディアン撃破、おつかれさまだ！

source:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_101<tab>Phantom trains, possessed pictures, and now this magitek-like machine...
Assuming it was real, the realm the Sigmascape is based on must have been highly advanced in both the arcane and the mechanical arts.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_101<tab>魔列車、チャダルヌークに続いて、今回の敵……。
被検世界「シグマ」のもとになったのは、
魔法にも、機械工学にも優れた世界だったんだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_102<tab>'Tis truly a pity we cannot identify the test world's origin. Imagine how much we might have learned from such a civilization had we encountered it under different circumstances.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_102<tab>出典がわからないのが、少し、惜しいな……。
こんな形ではなく触れられたなら、
学べることがたくさんあったはずだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_103<tab>But now is not the time for such idle thoughts. The next battle will be the last for this world, and Nero should have a strategy to share with us by now...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR204_03034_CID_000_103<tab>……ともあれ、今回の戦いも、次で最後になる。
ネロが対策を立てているようだが……。
